title: Ed25519 crypto utilities
description: Create a standalone crypto module for Ed25519 operations: keypair generation, message signing, signature verification, and macOS Keychain integration for private key storage. This is the foundation for all identity and messaging security. Uses only Node.js built-in crypto module (no external dependencies).

notes.content: Implemented Ed25519 crypto module. All test steps pass.

acceptanceCriteria: Generate Ed25519 keypair (32-byte seed, public key)
Store private key in macOS Keychain as credential-cc4me-agent-key
Retrieve private key from Keychain for signing
Sign arbitrary message payloads (JSON string → base64 signature)
Verify signatures against public keys (valid → true, tampered → false)
Export public key in base64 format for registration
All operations use Node.js crypto module only (no external deps)
